body_html: But isn't from_numpy a factory method? I might still want to compute the gradients wrt a numpy array, even if it's not going to be backproped before it, right (I'm thinking about neural style or deep dream, for example)?

body: But isn't `from_numpy` a factory method? I might still want to compute the gradients wrt a numpy array, even if it's not going to be backproped before it, right (I'm thinking about neural style or deep dream, for example)?
